Hi,

I already read this reply.

But it does not work for me and gives me same reply...

Will you please show me where exactly you have changed port and how you run your stuff in steps.

Thanks and Regards,

Jigar Patel

Andrea Goethals <andrea_goethals@...> wrote:                               Hi Jigar,

I had that same exception when I was trying to set up the CrawlController. Here's the entry from the mailing list about it - see if this solution works for you:
 http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/4304

Andrea

I am using Heritrix 1.12 version + HCC latest version  and JBOSS latest version.

I use same piece of code th  at you provided in example.


I am runing JBOSS + Heritrix instance + example code.

Please let me know where I am doing  mistakes.

Thanks and Regards,

Jigar

Andrea Goethals <andrea_goethals@... > wrote:                          Hi Jigar,

My hcc.properties only has a single line that's not a comment:

org.archive.hcc.ClusterControlleBean.maxPerContainer=3 


In my experience the real work in getting the CrawlController working is in writing wrapper class(es) and scripts for it. What your's should look like will depend on how you want to set up your crawlers (single machine, multiple machines), number of crawlers per jvm, etc. I can send you a  copy of ours but I think our set up is different from you want. We have 2 crawling machines, 2 crawlers on each machine (so 4 crawlers total), the crawl controller on one of those 2 machines. Jobs are allocated to crawlers based on the crawler preference specified as part of the job.  

We have another class that builds jobs ready to be allocated (by using a quartz scheduler and job configuration values from a database) by the crawl controller and puts them in a "crawl queue", which is just a directory. The crawl controller checks the crawl queue for ready jobs and allocates them to idle crawlers.   

Andrea



On 10/2/07, Jigar Patel < jigar_bca@...> wrote:                                     Hi,

I have started JBOSS and hjeritrix istance.
Please anyone give me sample hcc.properties file for setting HCC.

Thanks in advance,

Jigar Patel
